name: Eric Dubois 0002
content: Eric Dubois Eric Dubois Emeritus Professor Research Interests: Image and video processing Research Activities webpage Note to prospective students: I am not accepting any new students Other links: Publications Profile on Google Scholar Research Team Biographical sketch Book: Multidimensional Signal and Color Image Processing Using Lattices, Wiley, 2019.
